title: Presidential Race Cost Government $72 Million; WASHINGTON, Dec 31 (UPI) â€” The Federal Government spent $72 million to finance the 1976 Presidential election and has almost $24 million left as a base for building a new fund for the 1980 elections, rederal records show.
